snippet: The German Foreign Ministry repudiated a blunt memo from the BND agency that said Saudi Arabia was playing an increasingly destabilizing role in the Middle East.
abstract: German intelligence service memo accusing Saudi Arabia of disruptive interventions in Middle East draws reproach from German government; report criticizing new Saudi leaders comes as German lawmakers consider whether to join France in military campaign against Islamic State.

byline.contributor: Victor Homola and Ben Hubbard contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The German Foreign Ministry repudiated a blunt memo from the BND agency that said Saudi Arabia was playing an increasingly destabilizing role in the Middle East.

headline.main: Germany Rebukes Its Own Intelligence Agency for Criticizing Saudi Policy
headline.print_headline: Germany Rebukes Its Own Agency for Criticizing Saudi Policy

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
